original_text: But I withheld my hand, and for the sake of my name I did what would keep it from being profaned in the eyes of the nations in whose sight I had brought them out.
korean_text: 내가 내 이름을 위하여 내 손을 막아 달리 행하였나니 내가 그들을 인도하여 내는 것을 본 여러 나라 앞에서 내 이름을 더럽히지 아니하려 하였음이로라

sentences.original_text: and for the sake of my name
I did what would keep it from being profaned
in the eyes of the nations
in whose sight I had brought them out
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 보는 앞에서 내가 그들을 인도하였느니라
